title: Set up database schema
description: Define and implement the database schema based on the system requirements.

subtasks.title: Analyze system requirements for database needs
Define primary keys and foreign keys
Write SQL scripts to create tables
Test the schema with sample data
Review schema for scalability and future needs

details: Ensure normalization and support for future scalability.
